page.title: 18New Development
page.content: In the centre of the village there has been a recent (1985) improvement to{CHERRY TREE SQUARE, the work has taken five to six weeks . It involved laying cobbles over an area which was formerly covered in tarmac . Pear trees will soon be planted in prepared beds .The cobble stones are called granite lands.The company who did the work are from Chesterfield. Since 1970, two new small private housing estates have been built,two sets of flats for the elderly have been erected by the local council and The British Legion, a large old house has been converted into flats by The Housing Association and an old silk mill has been turned into flats and maisonettes.
